body:
i'm thankful for this perfect "[painted essay](https://www.terrain.org/2018/nonfiction/blue-mountain/)" about the gap between sights and stories.

i'm thankful [my favorite food blogger](https://tinyletter.com/salad_daily/letters/daily-salad-recipe-but-not-for-salad-is-that-too-confusing) is back. i'm thankful that we still have leftover chinese takeout and it's still very satisfying.

i'm thankful for our dishwasher, since though sometimes i prefer to hand wash dishes, sometimes i don't prefer that.

i'm thankful for [prozd on clickbait](https://twitter.com/prozdkp/status/983434649333633024). i'm thankful for [youtube culture, benjamin franklin edition](https://twitter.com/morayati/status/983896795238617088).

i'm thankful for when the beat kicks in hard on [this song](https://soundcloud.com/pow-recordings/6-feet?in=pow-recordings/sets/do-or-die).

i'm thankful [my favorite food blogger](https://tinyletter.com/salad_daily/letters/daily-salad-recipe-but-not-for-salad-is-that-too-confusing) is back. i'm thankful that we still have leftover chinese takeout and it's still very satisfying.

i'm thankful for our dishwasher, since though sometimes i prefer to hand wash dishes, sometimes i don't prefer that.

i'm thankful for [prozd on clickbait](https://twitter.com/prozdkp/status/983434649333633024). i'm thankful for [youtube culture, benjamin franklin edition](https://twitter.com/morayati/status/983896795238617088).
